descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod where the dragon plate armor is made to look darker, giving it a better look. installation is in README or below.
Better DragonPlate Mod
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Made by: Willfavre4
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Installation:
1. Go to your skyrim Data folder usually under;
C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimData
2. IF you DO NOT have a FOLDER called "textures", simply
drag the textures folder from the download into the data folder
3. IF you DO have a textures folder, copy the armor folder from
the download into the textures folder
4. IF you already have an armor folder, copy the dragonbone folder
from the download into that folder
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~Willfavre4
author: willfavre4
